<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104467</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104467</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086025</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Using handheld technologies in schools</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verwenden von von Handtechnologien in den Schulen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Utilisation des technologies tenues dans la main 
dans les écoles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Usando tecnologias handheld nas escolas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Usando le tecnologie tenute in mano nelle scuole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χρησιμοποίηση των φορητών τεχνολογιών στα σχολεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Usar tecnologías handheld en escuelas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Originally marketed as a personal organizer for on-the-go business executives and ardent technophiles, PDAs have evolved into handheld computing devices and have become one of the most ubiquitous electronic devices. Can these computing devices also be used to help fulfill the promise of educational computing?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprünglich vermarktet als persönlicher 
Organisator für auf-d-gehen Unternehmensleiter und leidenschaftliche 
technophiles, haben PDAs in rechnende Handeinheiten entwickelt und 
gewordenes der überall vorhandensten elektronischen Einheiten haben. 
Diese kann das Rechnen Einheiten auch verwendet werden, um zu 
helfen, die Versprechung des pädagogischen Rechnens zu erfüllen?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Initialement lancé sur le marché en tant 
qu'organisateur personnel pour sur-le-vont les cadres d'affaires et 
les technophiles ardents, PDAs se sont transformés en les dispositifs
de calcul tenus dans la main et ont devenu des dispositifs 
électroniques les plus omniprésents. Ces dispositifs le calcul
peut-il également être employé pour aider à accomplir la promesse 
de l'informatique éducative ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introduzído no mercado originalmente como um 
organizer pessoal para em-$$$-VÃO os executivos de negócio e os 
technophiles ardent, PDAs evoluiu em dispositivos computando handheld 
e tem tornado dos dispositivos eletrônicos os mais ubiquitous. 
Pode estes dispositivos computar também ser usado ajudar 
cumprir a promessa de computar educacional?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Originalmente di marketing come organizzatore 
personale per su-$$$-VANNO gli uomini d'affari ed i technophiles 
ardent, PDAs si è evoluto nei dispositivi di calcolo tenuti in mano 
ed ha quello diventato dei dispositivi elettronici più ubiquisti. 
Può questi dispositivi computare anche essere usata per 
contribuire a compiere la promessa di computazione educativa?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχικά πωλημένος ως προσωπικός διοργανωτής 
για-Ο-ΠΗΓΑΊΝΕΤΕ επιχειρησιακοί ανώτεροι υπάλληλοι και διακαή 
technophiles, PDAs έχουν εξελιχθεί στις φορητές συσκευές 
υπολογισμού και έχουν γίνει μια από τις πανταχού πιό παρούσες 
ηλεκτρονικές συσκευές. Μπορούν αυτές οι συσκευές 
υπολογισμού να χρησιμοποιηθούν επίσης για να βοηθήσουν να 
εκπληρώσουν την υπόσχεση του εκπαιδευτικού υπολογισμού;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Puesto originalmente como organizador personal 
para en-$$$-VAN los ejecutivos de negocio y los technophiles 
ardientes, PDAs se ha desarrollado en los dispositivos que computaban 
handheld y tiene convertido de los dispositivos electrónicos más 
ubicuos. ¿Se puede estos dispositivos el computar también 
utilizar para ayudar a satisfacer la promesa de computar educativo?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086025</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104467</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/using-handheld-technologies-in-schools</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
